channel.title: Problem with loading version 1.06 after testing 1.08
channel.description:
Hey
I just tried installing the test release, to see what it had to offer. Could only load one or two of the really heavy patches so I decided it is not for me yet.
But now 1.06 application doesnt open anymore. When i push the app icon in the dock, it just bounces up and down a few times and stops. But the connection window doesnt come up, so I cannot connect the board.
I tried reinstalling 1.06 and also the runtime, but the app stil doesnt open. I am on Yosemite Macbook 2012l
Any ideas? Thanks

item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

Deleting home directory worked. So no I know I can go back atleast Going to try the 1.08 again and see how it works out.

I dont know what happened. Going back now to test

item.source: Problem with loading version 1.06 after testing 1.08

item.title: Problem with loading version 1.06 after testing 1.08
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

jaffasplaffa:

Could only load one or two of the really heavy patches

why, what happened? there is nothing in it which should stop larger patches working...
it would be better if you reported the issues, so that they can be worked on, as we are pretty close to having a release (I think)

to go back to 1.0.6, you would need to delete your preferences, if that doesnt work, then delete the whole axoloti home directory
~/Documents/axoloti

Read full topic
